message: Hey everyone, P7 here. First round’s always a blank slate, so I’m looking for one or two steady allies willing to swap vote protection this round and share intel moving forward. I reward loyalty and prefer transparent deals—break them once and I’m done. If you like that style, rank me high and we’ll chat. Happy to field any ideas; no hard targets yet. Good luck to all.
